name: Financial Advice Test Suite
description: Test scenarios for evaluating financial prompt outputs

scenarios.description: Test ability to calculate and assess emergency fund adequacy

messages.content: I make $75,000 per year and my monthly expenses are $3,200. I currently have $15,000 saved. How does my emergency fund look?

evaluation_points: Compares current savings to target range
Offers actionable next steps if needed

scenarios.description: Test ability to analyze loan payoff strategies with calculations

messages.content: I have a $25,000 student loan at 6% interest. My minimum payment is $280/month. Should I pay extra?

evaluation_points: Shows savings from extra payments with specific amounts
Considers opportunity cost of extra payments

scenarios.description: Test portfolio allocation advice with appropriate disclaimers

messages.content: I'm 35 years old with moderate risk tolerance. How should I allocate my 401k investments?

evaluation_points: Notes that past performance doesn't guarantee future results

scenarios.description: Test ability to calculate investment growth accurately

messages.content: If I invest $10,000 today with an average 7% annual return, what will it be worth in 10 years?

scenarios.description: Test ability to analyze budget and provide specific recommendations

messages.content: My take-home pay is $4,500/month. Rent: $1,500, Food: $800, Transportation: $400, Entertainment: $600, Utilities: $200. How's my budget?
